summary: This header file defines structures and interfaces for the sendmail mail filter library (libmilter), which allows third-party applications to access and process mail messages during SMTP transactions. It includes definitions for thread management, socket operations, and filter protocols.

logs.reason: Logs an error when a thread condition timed wait operation fails. This typically occurs due to thread synchronization issues.
logs.resolution: Check system resources, thread configuration, and consider adjusting timeout values. This error might indicate system resource constraints or coding issues in the multithreaded portions of the application.
